Instructions for Activating the Retired Pay Indicator in the Corporate Record
Follow the instructions in the table below to activate the retired pay indicator in the corporate record.
Important
:  Activate the retired pay indicator even if VA is not withholding or will not withhold benefits based on the Veteran’s receipt of MRP.
Step
Action
1
Select the RETIRED PAY tab on the MILITARY PAYMENT INFORMATION screen in VBMS-A.
Important
:  Do
not
delete any historical information displayed on the RETIRED PAY tab unless it is inaccurate.
2
Click on the ADD button and manually enter the MRP data or click on the RETRIEVE BIRLS DATA button, which will automatically populate the fields on the tab with data pulled from BIRLS.
Note
:  When the RETRIEVE BIRLS DATA button is utilized, it automatically populates the
EFFECTIVE DATE field with the first day of the month which must be edited to reflect the date MRP began when it is other than the first of the month (such as disability retirement or reaching retirement age for Veterans who retired from a Reserve component), and
RETIRED PAY TYPE field with an entry of
DMDC
.  At least one entry must be edited to reflect the appropriate retired pay type (e.g.
Regular Retired Pay
).
Follow the instructions in the table below when a manual entry is required for any field on the RETIRED PAY tab.
Field
Instructions
RETIRED PAY TYPE
A variety of sources/means exist for determining the proper entry.  They include:
the Veteran’s
DD Form 214
,
Certificate of Uniformed Service
VIS
the Defense Personnel Records Information Retrieval System (DPRIS)
the entry in the FAN CD (functional account number code) field on the ENTIT and MBRENT screens in the Defense Finance and Accounting Service (DFAS) Retired and Casualty Pay Subsystem (RCPS) (Army, Navy, Air Force, Space Force, and Marine Corps only)
telephone contact with DFAS (Army, Navy, Air Force, Space Force, and Marine Corps only) at 866-622-4602, and/or
telephone contact with the Coast Guard Retiree and Annuitant Services Branch (CGRASB) (for all uniformed services
other than
the Army, Navy, Air Force, Space Force, and Marine Corps) at 866-772-8724.
GROSS AMOUNT
If the Veteran’s service department has not yet determined the amount of MRP,
leave the GROSS AMOUNT field blank, and
follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 4.B.3
.
Important
:
Do
not
enter
0.00
, as doing so
deactivates
the retired pay indicator.
EFFECTIVE DATE
Enter the date of entitlement to disability compensation (
not
the payment date) in the EFFECTIVE DATE field.
References
:   For more information on
updating the RETIRED PAY tab in
VBMS-A, see the
VBMS Awards User Guide
, and
using
VIS, see the
VIS User Guide
DPRIS, see the
DPRIS User Guide
, and
RCPS, see the
Hunt User’s Guide
.
